DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate exposure NN5401 ( insulin degludec/insulin aspart ) young adult elderly subject type 1 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Exposure NN5401 Young Adults Elderly Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1835 year ( inclusive ) ( young group ) least 65 year ( geriatric group ) Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Body mass index 18.028.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) HbA1c ( glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ) maximum 10.0 % central laboratory analysis Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per day ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period
